name: Special Cleansing Gel
about: What it is:A pH-balanced, foaming gel cleanser that gently removes impurities without disrupting your skin‚Äôs natural moisture balance..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Dullness, and Oiliness.Formulation:Lightweight Gel.Highlighted Ingredients:-.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:After using the Precleanse Cleansing Oil (sold separately), double-cleanse with this soap-free, naturally foaming cleanser, which leaves your skin feeling smooth and clean. Lightweight and gentle enough for daily use, this formula washes away toxins and debris without a drying or stripping effect.
ingredients: -Lavender: Soothes skin..-Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract: Naturally foams and cleanses. .. Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose,Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Cymbopogon Nardus (Citronella) Oil, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Propanediol, Citric Acid, O-Cymen-5-Ol, Disodium EDTA, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently lather a small amount in moistened hands and apply to a dampened face and neck..-Rinse with warm water..-Follow with toner and moisturizer...Pro tips:.-Never use hot water when cleansing; this strips skin of the natural oils critical in maintaining hydration levels..-For an exfoliating power cleanse, mix in Daily Microfoliant Exfoliator (sold separately)...Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse and recycle both the bottle and cap.

reviews.review_title: Really good for acne prone or sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been using this for 4 years now after getting it the first time as a gift from my aunt. I have really acne-prone skin and struggle finding cleansers that don‚Äôt irritate me and this is amazingggg! I can‚Äôt see myself  switching anytime soon

reviews.review_title: Gentle, cleansing, and perfect for acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is so gentle, soothing, yet effective at cleansing the skin. This cleanser cleared up some acne I was having and it has made my skin look so much smoother and brighter. The texture on my face has drastically improved.  I use the make up eraser cloth to remove my make up, and I use this cleanser afterwards to follow up. It works perfectly! My face hasn't been this clear and smooth in a long time.   I also own the Acne Clearing Face Wash by Dermalogica as well, and I want to say that the special cleansing gel formula actually works better for acne and skin texture. I'll be buying this one from now on.  It is pricey, but this is definitely the best basic (but not so basic) face wash I've ever used. My skin never feels tight or dry after using either. Definitely worth it and the bottle lasts a long time. Would highly recommend!   I purchased these products with my own money, this is not a sponsored review.

reviews.review_title: a MUST have in my everyday routine

reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite cleanser, super cleansing and the only cleanser I've used that gives immediate soothing. doesn't leave any weird feeling on your skin after rinsing just simply so so fresh

Highly recommend to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it. Doesn‚Äôt break me out. Very similar to cerave wash. Doesn‚Äôt take off makeup that well. Even with cleansing oil before. Need a few rounds of micellar water after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so disappointed.  I take back the good review I left. They apparently changed their formula! I bought a new bottle and it caused my cheeks to get red and dry plus I broke out severely on my chin. I got cystic acne from this! I used this for years and it worked great. What were they thinking?! I read on Reddit from a dermatologist that they decided not to work with them because they were changing their formulas to sell products at Target. So I guess they are putting cheaper ingredients in some of their products, so that they can sell it for cheaper. I am now having a hard time finding a new product that doesn't make me break out. It took me a long time before I was able to find this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really cleanses my skin and my skin feels fresh and clean after. However, it is slightly drying, although that might just be because of my skin type. The formula is great- it lathers up nicely.
